column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Although the collection is quite good
column2: the downside of this museum is that the interior is very confusing..there are 3 floors and most galleries are in the building but there is actually a separate building (this is helpful to know!) and just looking at the map
column3: it is very difficult to figure out how to get there. Nighthawks is in the separate building so make sure to find it!
